section.p: 'Excellent! Remember, it must be finished in eight weeks!' he says excitedly. The master seats you at a desk, and provides you with parchment, ink-pot and quill. You set to work.

The next day, a brightly coloured bird lands on the windowsill of the archives. 'Help me!' it squeaks. It transpires that the bird was once a princess from a far-off land, who has been transformed into a bird by a jealous witch.
